English: Accept the Belgians

It's well known that the Belgians, known as the Wallonians, have been culturally similar to the French for long enough. It is now time for us to unite with our Brothers and Sisters in the North, to welcome the Belgians into the glorious union of the French. We must stand united!
Revoke Belgian Rights

The scourge on the glorious French nation has and always will be the Belgians. We must assimilate them into the superior French culture to show them that their ways are simply idiotic and must be eraticated! Vive la France!
Join the Confederation of the Rhine
We've spent enough time being alone! Now we shall join the Confederation of our Brothers and Sisters! Together, the Germans will be strong!
Leave the Confederation of the Rhine
The Confederation has been nothing but awful for this nation! We shall paint our own legacy and leave this abomination!
Unite the Confederation of the Rhine

It's time to act upon the German dream. A dream of unity, prosperity, and this is all possible by first Uniting this Confederation. Alone, we're never going to beat anyone, but Together, then we'll have the German Eagle Rise!
Take the Syrian Desert
It's clear to Nations Worldwide that we deserve to own the Syrian Desert, and thus we shall take it under that oath.
Take Quebec
It's clear to Nations Worldwide that we deserve to own Quebec, and thus we shall take it under that oath.
The North Canadian Frontier
We must act and strike the North of Canada. It's time for us to proclaim more of the lands!
The Arctic Frontier
The Arctic of Canada must be ours! After all, we border it!
Unite the Romanian Nations

The Romanian People have remained divided for too long, and we have finally gotten enough power to declare ourselves a Romanian State. Under the Ideals of the Napoleonic Republics and the Enlightement, we shall begin the process for a greater Romanian State for the Romanian People. All for Romania!
Restore Ottoman rule over Greece

The pesky Greeks have revolted and thus we must punish them by restoring Ottoman rule over their former State. We cannot let the Greeks continue less the entire Ottoman Empire shall crumble which is unacceptable. For the Ottoman Greatness will never be Matched!
Take over Algeria

The French People in Algeria are fearful. Fearful of the Algerians taking their rightful Lands. Thus, it logically makes sense for us, the French Nation, to unite with our Brothers and take their Land by force. We cannot let this Oppression go on for much longer, for it is unacceptable.
Form Poland

The Polish People have been divided for too long! We must unite our People, our Brothers and Sisters, for all of us, we must reunite the former lands of the Polish! We cannot let tyranny take over, we will prevail!
Integrate American Canada
Our American People in Canada shall be welcomed into America Proper, as for they are Americans, just like us. We cannot stand for anyone saying otherwise.
Convert the People
The People of American Canada are to be Americanadians. We are not going to let the Anglo Oppression continue, thus we shall take the iniative.
Integrate Texas

To commemorate the Texan People who lost their lives in the Alamo, We shall integrate their Nation into their own, allowing their Culture to go on and not be oppressed by the Mexicans who've done nothing but wrongs. We are the Liberators. We shall not stand for what they've done.
Manifest Destiny

It is our God given right to settle the Lands west to our glorious Nation, yet the Mexicans have rightful American Lands. We will not stand for this, God has given us the Right and We will now take it back!
Integrate Puerto Rico
The People of Puerto Rico are similar enough to our Culture and We must integrate them into our Nation.
Realize the Antillean Confederation

The Antillean Confederation was a proposal made in the late 1860's to early 1870's by one Ramon Emeterio Betances has not been realized and has left the Carribean disunited, however in this age we don't stand for disunity when the Colonialists are taking over lands forcefully! We will liberate them just like we liberated ourselves from our old Colonizers! We shall never stand for their preposterous ideas!
Claim Colombia

The Proposal for the Antillean Confederation has rightfully claimed the Nation of Colombia who is or was under oppresive control of the Gran Colombian Regime. We must liberate our Brothers on the Mainland to see true Unity achieved! We must not stand for Colonialism to taint their image of the Liberators!
Claim Panama
Our Brothers in Panama are in trouble due to the oppresive Gran Colombian Regime and We must liberate them in order to ensure unity in this union.
The Bolivian Expedition
We have claimed lands in the Amazon, and thus, We must take the territories for ourselves.
The Minor Expedition
The Amazon is a clear part of Brazil and must be taken by our might.
The Amazonas Expedition
The State of Amazonas is a clear part of Brazil and must be taken by our might.
The Gran Colombian Expedition
Our glorious nation will take part of the Amazon for ourselves as it's a clear part of our glorious nation.
The Sao Paulo Treaty
We have to punish the Fools who thought Uruguay was theirs and we shall give them terms in order to do so.
The Santiago Treaty
We must give the fools from Rio de Janeiro a warning that messing with our territories is wrong and something we cannot stand for.
Leadership Boost
Quick Boost of Leadership Points
Demand Uruguay
The Idiots of Buesno Aires have Uruguay, which is obviously Rightful Brazilian land. We shall send them a strongly worded letter to cease Uruguay to us!
Incorperate Java
The Autonomous Zone of Java has gone on for too long. We will incorperate Java into our proper Nation.
Become England

The End of the United Kingdom has been reached. Our nation has been in Shambles after Scotland and Wales have declared their Independance. We will no longer be recognized as "The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland", but instead as "England".
Reorginize the Batavian Republic

The Batavian Republic has remained a stain for too long and We shall take action now. We shall send in a formal request to reorginize the Republic to Amsterdam and ensure that it remains in our Hands.
The Uganda Scheme

The Jewish People in Europe are suffering more and more from Antisemitism, and We must help their cause in any way possible. The Colony of Uganda is clearly the best choice, as it's one of the less important Colonial States in the Empire. We must declare a Jewish state for the Jewish People!
Integrate New Wales
New Wales is clearly rightful Platine Land, and We must integrate it into our Nation.
The Hong Kong Treaty Port
We must punish the Chinese, and now We will take over Hong Kong.
The Macau Treaty Port
We must punish the Chinese, and now We will take over Macau.
The Shanghai Treaty Port
We must punish the Chinese, and now We will take over Shanghai.
The Ningbo Treaty Port
We must punish the Chinese, and now We will take over Ningbo.
The Qingdao Treaty Port
We must punish the Chinese, and now We will take over Qingdao.
The Weihaiwei Treaty Port
We must punish the Chinese, and now We will take over Weihaiwei.
The Hainan Treaty Port
We must punish the Chinese, and now We will take over Hainan.
The Formosa Treaty Port
We must punish the Chinese, and now We will take over Formosa.
Conquer Burma

The Nation of Burma is clearly a part of our Colonial Holdings in India. There's no debate about it, yet their pitiful nation is Independant. This is outrageous, and We must act. We must destroy Burma and Integrate it ourselves.
Integrate Luxembourg
The Territory of Luxembourg has been under our possesion for long enough, and it's time we act. It's time for us to integrate it as a proper Region of France.
The Andinia Plan

Immigrants to Patagonia have increased to a high degree, and a lot of these Immigrants are Jewish. This means that We must protect the Jewish Populations in South America and that means that We must support the Zionism. We shall establish a Jewish state in Patagonia.
Demand the Destruction of the Napoleonic Order
The Napoleonic Order has remained for too long. It's time We declare a Crusade against it, by fighting it's evil! We cannot stand for it!
The Paris Conference
The Fools at London thought they could destroy our World order. They think they're clever, huh? Well We'll show them...
Restore Charlemagne's Legacy

The Great Charlemagne has been left unrecognized for the sands of time. Time has passed and Charlemagne's Legacy has been forgotten over time, eventually being replaced by the Holy Roman Empire. The time has now come to reinstate a Carolingian Order.
Integrate Switzerland

The Territories of Switzerland are very clearly Carolingian Clay, and it's time people recognize this as the Truth. The Swiss Nation should not exist and We will take it for the sake of Charlemagne. Three Hurrahs to Charlemagne!
Move the Capital to Metz

Charlemagne's Restoration cannot be complete without moving the Capital away from Paris, and thus a great plan has to be achieved. We must move the Capital to Metz, to truly reconnect ourselves to the Carolingian Empire.
Integrate Uruguay
The Time has come for us to properly integrate Uruguay into our Union of Platine States.
The London Conference
The Fools at Paris have been humbled once more, and we'll punish their idiotic actions.
Dutch Reintegration
We've finally earned enough of a Status to reintegrate into the proper Dutch state, and as thus, We must do so to ensure stability between the Dutch Nations.
Demand Catalonia
Catalonia whilst never having been a part of France, still clearly has desires to join France. We must ensure their Protection by demanding Spain hand over the Territories that We metioned before.
Claim Wales

Wales is a clear part of England and the stupid notion that it isn't is ludicrous. We must assert dominance over the Welsh by showing that the English are better than their silly little state. We must proclaim English Wales.
Working on the Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo
We've beaten the Mexicans and gotten our rightful territories, now it's just about making the right treaty, and we need your help.
Integrate Hungary

The Hungarian Territories of the Empire are yet to be properly integrated, and it's been clear that if we don't we'll have major consequences. It's time we recognize the Hungarians as a part of the Habsburg Dynasty and accept their Cultural values.
Integrate Bohemia
The Bohemians have been with us for a long time now, and it's about time we accept their ways and Cultural values into the Habsburg Dynasty and ensure more Unity among their people.
Reform the Empire's Constitution
The Habsburg Empire has been using an Outdated Constitution and it is in desperate need of Reform, thus making it more free for the People. It's time for a new Empire to replace the old one.
The Polish Conspiracy
The Lands of Poland deserve to accept more people into their State. That's why a Jewish state shall be set up in their Lands as a gift.
Accept the Irish
The Irish are very clearly a part of the United Kingdom and it's time for us to accept this fact by integrating their culture into our nation's identity.
Declare a German Nation
It is time for us to unite the Germans together! For too long We've waited, we must act now! Germany shall rise like a phoenix to the Napoleonic Order! Three Hurrahs for Germany!
Integrate Alsace-Lorraine
The Territory of Alsace-Lorraine is under our control and is very clearly German. We will properly integrate them into our great Nation. Three Hurrahs for Germany!
Form the Danubian Confederation

Our Nation has recently been given a proposal to form a new nation, respectful to everyone living in it. The Proposed Nation? The Danubian Confederation. There's been many proponants of the idea, and it appears that enacting it is in high support.
Annex the Kingdom of Slavonia

The territories we used to own are now known as the Kingdom of Slavonia and no longer under our Control. Yet We can change this. With our Influence over the state, we can annex it back into our glorious land.
Reclaim Galicia-Lodomeria
The Territories of Galicia-Lodomeria have been under our Enemy's grasp for far too long. And today's the day it ends! We will reclaim Galicia-Lodomeria in the name of Austria!
Reclaim the Territories of the Polish Partition

The Former Lands of the Polish Partition are not in our hands anymore, and that is unacceptable. We must reclaim these Lands in order to re-establish German Dominance over Central Europe! We must stand for this!
The Question of German-Austria

Austria, while populated by a lot of Germans, has always had the same question attached to it. Should it be integrated into a German Nation? The Question, while simple, has been debated upon for decades and it's time we give an Answer. \n \n §R (YOU SHOULD HAVE AT LEAST 10 INFAMY FREE BEFORE PRESSING THIS DECISION!) §W
Inspire German Militarism

The German Military is currently in need of more Men, and We can take our chance now by inspiring them to join into the Military. After all, it's only natural after our failure against Napoleon that we hire more people to possibly usurp his domination of Europe.
Restore the Teutonic Legacy
The Teutonic Order was a great nation from a long time ago, and now it's about time we restore it's legacy by reclaiming the Lands of the Baltics and the Germans in them.
Petition for Prussian Annexation
The small state of Memel has always been on the brink of annexation as it were anyways, and it appears the end of our Nation is nearing. It's time we request formal annexation.
The Canadian Oath

The Northern parts of North America are naturally a part of our nation and the denial of this comes from one source, the British. We shall proclaim the Canadian Oath, thus allowing us to take over Canada for the Canadian People.
Enact the Golden Circle

Our recent victory against the Yanks of the North have allowed us to fully realize our Ambitions in the South. We will enact the Golden Circle, and for once, We will triumph over the North! We will succeed!
Emancipation Proclamation
As We are dealing with the Confederate Scum, it's time we accept the now liberated Slaves from their Captors and proclaim them as Free People, who can support us against the current rebellion.
Native Rights Act

The Natives are a part of our Nation, and while we've had our differences, we must give them the benefit of their proper rights. It's time we treat the people of our Nation as people and not as slaves.
Abandon the United States

A failed state. Do you know what it is? What it implies? Of course you don't. You haven't seen what happens when a Superpower collapses. Now... There is no more United States. No more America... at least, not really. Two American Empires. Six Seperatist States. You haven't seen anarchy, yet... \n \n §R (WARNING: Pressing this decision is your ONLY chance to change to the Free States of America, the Pacific States of America and the Confederates. Consider it wisely.) §W
Sell Alaska

Alaska is becoming a money sink for our nation, and it's starting to become a serious bottleneck. We shall sell it to someone else. \n \n §R (WARNING: Pressing this Decision will make you sell Alaska, HOWEVER the AI will have a fifty-fifty chance to actually purchase Alaska) §W
Fate of the Slavonians
The Slavonians have been under our rule for enough time for them to decide which is better, French Integration or Independance. It's time their Nation decides what is right.
Open Options
Open the Option Menu. This Decision automatically disables itself on 1837.
Close Options
Close the Option Menu.
Disable Napoleonic Order
This is the thing limiting you from declaring war on other nations for Cores. Press this Decision if you don't want to wait for Core Wargoals to unlock.
Take all Cores
Take all Cores if you don't already own them.
Enable Test Decisions
Enable certain decisions meant for testing out the Mod.
